label: 乾嶺
本: Sand and Pebbles: The Tales of Mujû Ichien, A Voice for Pluralism in Kamakura Buddhism . State University of New York Press . 1985
説明文: Also Kenryō Keigan.  Late seventeenth/early eighteenth centuries.  Composed a Biographical Sketch of Mujū Kokushi (Mujū Kokushi ryakuengi) (p. 284).　[無住国師略縁起]
